name: ProSunergy Limited
membership:
ACP/LDC Sugar Industries Group
Non-executive Director, Alteo Ltd (Mauritius)
goal:
ProSunergy conducts strategic analysis in sugar and renewable fuels. Main topics are farming practices, industrial processes, market and investment analysis, business development, trade and agricultural policy.
Clients include farmer organisations, corporations and cooperatives, sugar industry organisations, governments and multilateral intergovernmental organisations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Energy, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: Areas of interaction with EU institutions are: the Common Agricultural Policy with particular focus on sugar and ethanol; trade policy, with particular emphasis on preferential trade agreements; aid and support for developing countries; energy policy; food and health issues.
customers: La Romana Corporation, Consorcio Azucarero de Empresas Industriales, Consorcio Azucarero Central
